column4: I have a problem with my Ubuntu 10.10, I just downloaded an update and after that, the screen will go to a console saying something about a batery power and firefox. I restart it and it was gone, while I was watching a You Tube video the black screen poped up again. I have to restart again and now im here. What should I do?
The error is very very important.
It sounds like a graphics card problem to me
I don't know what the battery/firefox thing could possibly be
Or atleast no error message. But only after this update i have this problem
can you do an lspci and an lshw and post them to a pastebin?
TY. Sorry if I overlooked it, I usually only notice lines with hilight on them unless I'm paying a lot of attention.
run that command, "grep Driver /var/log/Xorg.0.log" that Dr_Willis mentioned.
